name: Nightmare Creatures
overview: The game takes place in 1834 when London falls victim to several evil occurrences. Monster sightings are reported along with news of people mutating into ungodly creatures, and that the dead are waking from their graves and walking amongst the living. All of London is in a panic and vulnerable to the schemes of Adam Crowley, a mad scientist and occultist enlisting the help of the Brotherhood.Free your homeland in 19th-century Prague from a horde of gothic horror monsters that have been released by an evil wizard in this action-adventure.
